metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000833 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ZoneMinder version <= 1.32.2 contains a Other/Unknown vulnerability in User-controlled parameter that can result in Disclosure of confidential data, denial of service, SSRF, remote code execution.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
